name: FHART
description:
Controls

WASD - Move around

Click or Spacebar - Attack

Run around and avoid the skeletons that spawn from the graves. Kill them by shooting projectiles at them, some of them will drop organs on death which will give you health on pickup.

This game was created for Ludum Dare 44 and was a result of not being able to come up with a proper idea for our game we just came up with a random "shitty" idea.
